name: Absolutely Maybe
description: Evidence and uncertainties about medicine and life explored through Hilda Bastian's comics.

name: BuzzHootRoar
description: Sharing science with art in 300 words or less.

name: Latest Thinking
description: Open access science videos ranging from astronomy to physics, from, economics (@LT_Econ) to philosophy.

name: @RealScientists
description: Real science from real scientists, writers, communicators, artists & clinicians.

name: Useful Science
description: Website and podcast for living better, backed by science. Follow for one-sentence summaries of research on happiness, health, productivity, and more.

name: SciWorthy
description: Sciworthy.com helps science make sense and brings everyone into the conversation.

name: Verbalize Science
description: Summarizing academia and quasi-academia, one document at a time at http://acawiki.org

name: ACA Wiki
description: Summarizing academia and quasi-academia, one document at a time at http://acawiki.org

description: Breaking through academic paywalls since 2011. Oреn Aссеss & Ореn Sсiеnсе

name: Journalist's Resource
description: A team of journalists helping other journalists access and understand academic research. A project of Harvard's @ShorensteinCtr.

name: Science Gist
description: Science gists are simplified summaries of scientific papers. Our goal is to bring science closer to everyone.

name: Publiscize
description: Platform that helps scientists break down and promote their published research for lay audiences.

name: Brevy
description: Brevy is a wiki for summaries of academic research. We seek to make research more accessible and understandable for scholars and non-scholars alike.

name: Three Sentence Science
description: The latest intelligence, in three sentences.

name: Tiny TOCS
description: Tiny Transactions on Computer Science (TinyToCS) is the premier venue for computer science research of 140 characters or less.
